name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
method:
Step 1: Melt butter in a skillet. 
Step 2: Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. 
Step 3: Add shrimp and cook until pink. 
Step 4: Squeeze lemon juice and sprinkle parsley on top before serving.

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
method:
Step 1: Marinate chicken in a mixture of lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, and rosemary. 
Step 2: Grill chicken until cooked through. 
Step 3: Serve with additional lemon slices and fresh herbs.

name: Pasta Primavera
method:
Step 1: Cook pasta according to package instructions. 
Step 2: Sauté vegetables in olive oil with minced garlic until tender. 
Step 3: Toss cooked pasta with vegetables and top with grated parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
method:
Step 1: Stir-fry beef in a hot skillet until browned. 
Step 2: Add sliced bell peppers, onions, soy sauce, and ginger. 
Step 3: Cook until vegetables are tender and sauce has thickened. 
Step 4: Serve over rice.

name: Baked Salmon with Dill Sauce
method:
Step 1: Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. 
Step 2: Bake in the oven until cooked through. 
Step 3: Mix chopped dill, sour cream, and Dijon mustard for the sauce. 
Step 4: Serve salmon with dill sauce on top.
